Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties, methods, and events of the <font face="courier new">DataTable</font> class against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: This property specifies or retrieves the table name.
This property retrieves the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> belonging to the table.
This event occurs on deletion of a row in the table.
This event occurs on inserting a row in the table.
This method removes all the data from the table.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(4), (B)-(5), (C)-(1), (D)-(2), and (E)-(3).
